GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
ASoC: fsl: Fix refcount leak in imx_sgtl5000_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit e84aaf23ca82753d765bf84d05295d9d9c5fed29, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit 81e8e4926167ab32593bbb915b45a42024ca1020. For more details please see the references link.
